title: 'Pippin' Performs The Final Ballad Of 'The Hobbit'
teaser: Billy Boyd was the hobbit Pippin in The Lord of the Rings films, and he's a musician, too. He talks to NPR's Rachel Martin about writing the last song for the new movie, The Battle of the Five Armies.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
